QuestData.Title: Deteriorating Knowledge
QuestData.Description:
The kelfin are no strangers to Azshara's cruelty.
She commands creatures of darkness that entrap my kind and warp their minds. They eat away at their memories until nothing's left but an empty husk.
If you can get to them soon, perhaps they'll still be in a state worth saving.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Fenn, Kono, and Esma from the clutches of mind-leeching Zoatroids.
